quote: Some people want it to happen, some wish it would happen, others make it happen.

categories.description: Fourth year into Computing and Financial Management Honours Co-op Program at University of Waterloo. I have worked 5 internships pertaining to web and software development at DBRS, Ashlin-BPG, BDO, and VPEC. On the side, I also take various online courses in Machine Learing for Trading, full-stack development, and Introduction to AI. I am also preparing to take on CFA exams as I have completed courses in Global Financial Markets, Corportate Finance, Fix-income Securities, and Derivatives.

On this site you can find various projects I worked on both in school and co-op. These emphasize some of the skills I have as a developer. Some of my strong front-end skills including HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, JavaScript, jQuery, Angular. Also, I have sharp back-end experience in C# (MVC, Entity Framework, ORM), C++, Python (Flask), JAVA, T-SQL, MySQL, noSQL, and ASP. In addition, I am familiar with Git, SVN, and TFS.
Passionate in playing violin and piano from a young age. Love to compete in music festivals and share music around the world. I have ...
Passionate in playing sports such as Basketball, Tennis, Rugby, Ping Pong, and Volleyball.
